title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 628.6 - Projects
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 628.6 - Projects

State Regulations
(a) Eligible resource recovery equipment may include, but is not limited to, pyrolizat on facilities, separation devices, energy conversion units, biological conversion facilities, shredders used for resource recovery, and structures necessary to contain and maintain the equipment. (b) Eligible disposal equipment may include, but is not limited to, earth moving machinery, shredders used for volume reduction, compaction machinery, and structures necessary to house and maintain the equipment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
628.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
